name: Souless Greetings
description: We make souless greeting statements based on the weather that can be used generally like "Hi, this is Sejin Jeon of Konkuk University. Be careful not to catch a cold while the change of seasons like nowadays." or "안녕하세요, 건국대학교 전세진입니다. 어디론가 훌쩍 떠나고 싶을 정도로 봄 날씨가 완연한 요즘입니다."
